  • Packages that use RichEmbed 
    Package Description
    io.discloader.discloader.core.entity  
    io.discloader.discloader.core.entity.channel
    Contains the class that implement the channel interfaces
    io.discloader.discloader.core.entity.message
    Contains all classes relating to Messages
    io.discloader.discloader.core.entity.user
    Contains class related to the user object
    io.discloader.discloader.entity.channel
    Contains classes that represent channels on discord
    io.discloader.discloader.entity.message  
    io.discloader.discloader.entity.sendable
    Contains prototypes meant to be serialized and sent to Discord's servers via REST or gateway
    io.discloader.discloader.entity.user  
    io.discloader.discloader.network.rest.actions.channel
